mapper.select: SELECT trs_activity.id,trs_activity.qrcode,trs_activity.name,trs_activity.price,trs_activity.course_num,trs_activity.sales_num FROM trs_activity as trs_activity LEFT JOIN trs_course_activity as trs_course_activity ON trs_activity.id = trs_course_activity.id LEFT JOIN trs_school_activity as trs_school_activity ON trs_activity.id = trs_school_activity.id
